data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Ilfov to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ilfov, Romania
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 30,806 believers in Ilfov to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.section_summary: On average, 63 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Ilfov, Romania.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 30,806 believers in Ilfov, Romania a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 30,806 believers in Ilfov to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the South Asian, general people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the South Asian, general people worship before you. For the kingdom of the South Asian, general people is yours.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Ilfov, Romania.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Ilfov, Romania to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 30,806 believers in Ilfov, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

location.name: Ilfov
